info.name: Vendify User & Role Management API
info.description: Comprehensive Postman collection for the Vendify assignment backend. It covers utility checks, authentication, user CRUD, role CRUD, and audit log queries with helpful defaults and scripts to capture JWT tokens.

item.name: Utility
item.description: Quick smoke tests to ensure the service is reachable before exercising authenticated flows.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Obtain, refresh, and revoke JWTs. The login response is used to hydrate collection variables for downstream requests.

item.name: Users

response.name: Get Current User
response.body:
{
    "status": true,
    "data": {
        "id": "55a77154-ac4e-4b29-a21f-5004d324ab47",
        "company_id": "ea4fe470-9661-4f04-a580-0c8441ede01a",
        "role_id": "5d12964f-b973-42c4-84cf-58f16e9f340b",
        "email": "admin@acme.com",
        "name": "Updated Name",
        "is_deleted": false,
        "is_active": true,
        "created_by": null,
        "created_at": "2025-11-18T09:11:14.000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-11-18T10:29:29.000Z",
        "Role": {
            "name": "Company Admin",
            "permissions": {
                "can_create_role": true,
                "can_create_user": true,
                "can_delete_role": true,
                "can_delete_user": true,
                "can_update_role": true,
                "can_update_user": true,
                "can_view_audit_logs": true
            }
        }
    }
}

item.description: All endpoints require a valid Bearer token. Permissions such as can_create_user, can_update_user, and can_delete_user must be granted by the role.

item.name: Roles

response.name: List Roles
Get Role By ID
Create Role
Update Role

item.description: Role endpoints allow RBAC management. Creation, updates, and deletes require the respective permissions (e.g., can_create_role).

item.name: Audit Logs

response.name: List Audit Logs

item.description: Audit log queries are limited to company admins with can_view_audit_logs permission.
